title: How would you describe the Chinese name '阮天文' (characters, names, Chinese)? - Quora

response.answer_text: 阮——ruǎn 天——tiān 文——wén 「阮」is a surname with over 3000-year history. (Also an instrument) 「天」=sky, day, specific time on a day, season, weather, natural, the Lord, resources that everyone needs, God, heaven/paradise, above, naturally 「文」=characters, written language, essay, Classical Chinese, Development of a society, arts, laws, not military, etiquette, natural phenomenon, Pattern, gently/gental, Tattoo(verb), hide, Wen(Currency unit) 「天文」=astronomy ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• 「阮」, one of the Chinese surnames. It mainly originated from the ancient emperor Gaotao(皋陶), and the country was named as「阮」(?~BC 11 century)(nowadays Jingchuan County, Gansu Province). Later, the 「阮」 family moved eastward and formed a prominent family in Chenliu County during the Three Kingdoms Period at the end of Han Dynasty. ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• 「天文」is a male Chinese name, sounds like a gentleman born in 1920s or 1990s or 2010s, who might be rich and good at literature. ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• Celebrities : 阮经天(Ethan Juan)(Actors) 阮玲玉(Ruan Lingyu)(1910–1935)(Actress) 阮圣文/阮伟旌(Ruan Shengwen/Ruan Weijing)(Actor) 阮可强(Ruan Keqiang)(1932.12.19–2017.04.29)(Scientist)
I would say this is not a Chinese name, but a Vietnamese one instead. I have never seen 阮 used as a last name in China, whereas it is the most popular last name in Vietnam.
